additional_info:
Storeroom, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, Security, Alarm System, Generator, Heating - Conditioning, Heating system: central, gas, Hot water: gas 
 Office space for rent in Tbilisi in a prestigious office building, on Marjanishvili St. # 5 (in close proximity to Marjanishivili Theater and TBC Bank). The office space is located on the 3rd floor conveniently accessible by stairs. The office space is made up of 330 sq. meters (it is possible to break the space into 2 parts of 215 sq. meters and 115 sq. meters and rent it separately). Price: $17/sq. meter totaling $5,610 USD/ month equivalent in Georgian Lari. The price includes the following: 2 parking spots (additional pay parking available) 24-hour security, secured entrance video surveillance, and VAT.
